item.description:
Hit Squad has gained popularity and this will be a new venue for them. Band plays top 40's, with a mix. Foccasias in Wilmington is a fun place to chill on a Friday night after a long work week. This venue has a huge restaurant with adjacent bar where you can eat, full size Italian menu with a visual display of desserts, will reserve tables if they let me, so come early if hungry to help hold some tables. No cover, dress down. Band starts 9pm will be cross posting with another group..I will get there with my co-host Carol between 7:30-8. I will do the introductions prior to the band playing, after that I will be up on the dance floor enjoying myself . http://www.hitsquad.net/songlisting.html songs link

 

Band: Hit Squad

Time: 9-closing
item.how_to_find_us: Will be in Lounge Meet Up sign on table

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dance To Live Band "Hit Squad"
